title: FS: Four raw T206 Maddox, all tough backs (AB350, Tolstoi, EPDG, Polar Bear)

posts.post_title: FS: Four raw T206 Maddox, all tough backs (AB350, Tolstoi, EPDG, Polar Bear)
posts.post_content:
For sale are four T206 cards of Nick Maddox with four different tough backs. Prices include shipping. Please PM if interested.

AB350: $120 (SOLD)
Tolstoi: $40 (SOLD)
EPDG: $70 (SOLD)
Polar Bear: $20 (SOLD)

[IMG]https://hosting.photobucket.com/images/gg98/dkathman1/D0327E61_D81A_4DF3_992B_D93FBFD288CA.jpeg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://hosting.photobucket.com/images/gg98/dkathman1/A244FD73_5280_401A_B1DC_369D737297C7.jpeg[/IMG]
All four cards are sold. Thanks for playing, everybody.
